params.name: image_processor
params.description: An instance of BlipImageProcessor. The image processor is a required input.

params.name: tokenizer
params.description: An instance of [PreTrainedTokenizer`]. The tokenizer is a required input.

params.name: qformer_tokenizer
params.description: An instance of [PreTrainedTokenizer`]. The Q-Former tokenizer is a required input.

params.name: num_query_tokens
params.description: Number of tokens used by the Qformer as queries, should be same as in models config.
